content.rendered:
Lucky Paws

Your Neighborhood Pet Wellness Center

1-650-200-3406

Our Locations

Request Appointment

Request Appointment

Lucky Paws

Your Neighborhood Pet Wellness Center

1-650-200-3406

Our Locations

Request an Appointment

Request Appointment

A HOST OF NEW
SERVICES

Lucky Paws is not just the best place in your town for pet grooming anymore. We also offer day care, boarding, overnight stays, checkups, on-site pharmacies and more! Or why not all? After all, our pets deserve love and optimal health just like we do.

We now offer special dog and cat day care plans, click the button below to inquire or book with us. Our goal is to surpass your expectations and deliver the highest quality pet services possible.

Inquire about our Day Care Booking and see why your friends and family come to Super Pets Grooming for world class Day Care.

LEARN MORE

Wellness Center Services

Our experts are here to assist with an extraordinary array of pet services all under one roof.

Grooming Services

Our groomers are highly skilled and will follow your instructions to deliver everything from a simple puppy cut, to specific breed standard groom. Services range from cuts to nail-trimming and filing, hair shedding treatment, teeth cleaning and much more.

Bathing Services

When only a bath is needed, we have you covered. Our products are all natural and soothing to your pets. Our bath and brushout will get them clean and looking freshly groomed.

Spa Services

Pets need a day for R&R too. Treat them to one of our spa packages to nourish their skin and coat to get them feeling their best.

Boarding and Overnight

We want our community to think of us as not only a great place for groom or bath, but also a second home away from home for your furry friend with our boarding and overnight stay services. We have a surprising array of onsite amenities. Call, click or come in to learn more!

BOOK WITH US NOW!

Additional Healthcare Services

Dr.Pet MD
Animal Hospital

There’s a reason we’re known for being a comprehensive and  holistic pet wellness company. The Dr Pet MD franchise of Veterinary Hospitals can provide same day on-premises diagnosis for your pet and are all under the same company umbrella. We offer major services like surgery, X-Rays and even have an on-site pharmacy!

Animal Hospital Services

Legacy Grooming Services

We are forever growing expanding for you. Here are some recent services we’ve added to our menu.

Cat Grooming

Cat grooming and bathing available at at select location. Click the button below for more details.

Learn More

Doggy Day Care

Lucky Paws is now offering day care services at select locations. Click below to learn more .

Learn More

Online Pet Store

Online pet supplies to be delievered in select areas across the metro New York area.

Learn More
See All Services

Pet Pickup and Delivery

Now offering Transportation for Grooming in Huntington and Syosset. Transportation for Doggy Day Care is available for our Syosset location.

Call Us: 1-650-200-3406

Testimonials

What Our Patrons Say

Nothing brings us more joy than hearing from our satisfied customers.

The staff is always smiling, respectful and caring about the owners, and of course the dogs as well. The groomer was very nice, and asked me what kind of hair style I wanted my dog to be groomed

Ismael Martinez, NY

I’m in love with how his cut came out. I’ve finally found my go to groomer! My Harley is 14 years old going on 15 and he looks like a puppy with his recent grooming.

Daniela, NY

Great staff. Friendly prompt and i have an older dog. (Aussie shepherd). With weak hips. They handled him great. Love the doggy day spa. Thank you guys. Chase looks and smells awesome...

Joey Simms, NY

Contact Us

Have any questions about our services? Feel free to contact us at any time.

Contact Us Now

Looking for the Lucky Paws Grooming Waiver? Click the button to fill out and submit!

Grooming Waiver
